alert.note: Alert for Denton; Wise (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 13 at 6:57AM CST until December 13 at 7:45AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Eastern Wise County in north central Texas... Northwestern Denton County in north central Texas... * Until 745 AM CST. * At 657 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Paradise, or 7 miles southeast of Bridgeport, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Decatur around 715 AM CST. Krum around 745 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Ponder, Stony, Bolivar, Slidell and Cottondale. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
